Creating a SongPlayer

The SongPlayer API carries all the information it needs in a SongPlayer structure. You create a SongPlayer using SongPlayer_Create(), which sets a pointer you specify to the new SongPlayer. You need to specify the location of the SPMIDI context you've previously created, and the address and size of the image in memory of the file you want to play. 

	SongPlayer *songPlayer = NULL;

	result = SongPlayer_Create( &songPlayer, spmidiContext, address, size );
	if( result < 0 ) handleErr();

If the function call is successful, result will be 0. In this case, your pointer to the context structure will be updated to point to the new SongPlayer.
